comment:
The ingredients:
1. 3 slices of bread 
2. 30gr butter 
3. 20gr chopped garlic(around 2/2,5 tablespoon, depends on ur taste)
5. 10gr(less than 1 tablespoon) honey(or any sweetness) 
6. Parsley or oregano 
Mix them well, put on the bread. Put some butter or oil on the pan n stir fry till it gets golden brown. Done.

Edit: many thanks for thanking! Happy to help :D
